description: This file contains utility functions for date formatting and debouncing, which are likely used across multiple parts of the frontend application.

methods.name: formatDateISO(iso)
methods.description: Formats an ISO date string into a human-friendly short format including date and time.

methods.name: debounce(fn, wait = 400)
methods.description: Creates and returns a debounced version of the provided function that delays its execution until after wait milliseconds have elapsed since the last time it was invoked.
